data.title: M G Ramachandran: Latest News, Photos, Videos on M G Ramachandran
meta_keywords: M G Ramachandran videos M G Ramachandran photos M G Ramachandran latest updates
data.meta_description: Find M G Ramachandran Latest News, Videos & Pictures on M G Ramachandran and see latest updates, news, information from NDTV.COM. Explore more on M G Ramachandran.
data.text:
All

News

Videos

'M G Ramachandran' - 17 News Result(s)

India News | Press Trust of India | Saturday July 25, 2020

A statue of former Tamil Nadu Chief Minister M G Ramachandran was found draped with a saffron shawl at Puducherry leading to protest by AIADMK and Chief Minister V Narayanasamy on Friday assured members of the territorial assembly that quick action would be taken against the culprits.

www.ndtv.com

Entertainment | Edited by Divya Goyal | Friday October 4, 2019

Arvind Swamy will play actor-turned-politician MGR, who featured in 28 box office hits with Jayalalithaa.

www.ndtv.com/entertainment

Tamil Nadu News | Press Trust of India | Sunday September 30, 2018

Ruling AIADMK today lashed out at DMK over its criticism of former Chief Minister M G Ramachandran's birth centenary celebrations, saying the amount spent on it was a fraction of that used by DMK for the world Tamil conference when it was in power in 2010.

www.ndtv.com

Chennai News | Press Trust of India | Sunday September 30, 2018

The Madras High Court today directed removal of all unauthorised banners erected across the city in connection with the valedictory function of the centenary celebrations of ruling AIADMK founder and late chief minister M G Ramachandran, hours ahead of the event.

www.ndtv.com

Tamil Nadu News | Press Trust of India | Saturday September 29, 2018

Accusing the AIADMK government in Tamil Nadu of using late leader M G Ramachandran's birth centenary for "political mileage", DMK president M K Stalin Saturday said he will not take part in the valedictory function.

www.ndtv.com

Tamil Nadu News | Press Trust of India | Sunday December 24, 2017

AIADMK leaders O Panneerselvam and E Palaniswami today paid homage to party founder, late Chief Minister M G Ramachandran on his 30th death anniversary.

www.ndtv.com

Business | Press Trust of India | Wednesday September 13, 2017

The coins will commemorate the birth centenary of noted Carnatic singer and Bharat Ratna awardee late M S Subbulakshmi.

www.ndtv.com/business

Business | NDTV Profit Team | Tuesday September 12, 2017

"The coins of the denominations (Rs 100 and Rs 5) shall also be coined at the Mint for issue under the authority of the Central Government to commemorate the occasion of Dr M G Ramachandran's birth centenary," a notification from the Ministry of Finance stated.

www.ndtv.com/business

Tamil Nadu News | Press Trust of India | Saturday January 14, 2017

The Centre has accepted Tamil Nadu's request to release a special postage stamp on the occasion of former chief minister and AIADMK founder M G Ramachandran's birth centenary on January 17, the state government said today.

www.ndtv.com

South | Press Trust of India | Friday January 6, 2017

The Tamil Nadu government has urged the Centre to issue a commemorative coin and special postal stamp on the birth centenary of former Chief Minister M G Ramachandran, saying it would be a "fitting tribute" to the Bharat Ratna recipient on the occasion.

www.ndtv.com

Tamil Nadu News | Press Trust of India | Wednesday December 7, 2016

A day after she was laid to rest near the memorial site of her political mentor M G Ramachandran at Marina beach in Chennai, thousands of people from all over Tamil Nadu continued to make a beeline to the spot to pay homage to late Chief Minister Jayalalithaa.

www.ndtv.com

Tamil Nadu News | Press Trust of India | Tuesday May 24, 2016

To celebrate the swearing in of AIADMK Supremo Jayalalithaa as Chief Minister for the sixth time, an auto driver Coimbatore on Monday offered his service by taking passengers for one rupee to any place in the city.

www.ndtv.com

Tamil Nadu News | Press Trust of India | Thursday December 24, 2015

Tributes were paid to AIADMK founder and former matinee idol M G Ramachandran today on his 28th death anniversary with party supremo and Chief Minister J Jayalalithaa leading the supporters in remembering the late leader.

www.ndtv.com

Elections News | Press Trust of India | Friday April 4, 2014

Adopting various ingenious strategies to attract crowds to rallies, political parties in Tamil Nadu are roping in look-alikes of leaders like M G Ramachandran, Jayalalithaa and M Karunanidhi to connect with the audience and add a dash of colour to the poll scene.

www.ndtv.com

South | Press Trust of India | Wednesday October 17, 2012

AIADMK supremo and Tamil Nadu Chief Minister J Jayalalithaa on Wednesday led her supporters in celebrating the 41st anniversary of the party that was founded by actor-politician M G Ramachandran in 1972 following differences with DMK chief M Karunanidhi then.

www.ndtv.com
